author: Elias Schisgall
title: Texas Instruments to Acquire Silicon Labs in Deal Valued at $7.5 Billion
description: Texas Instruments agreed to acquire Silicon Labs in a deal with an enterprise value of about $7.5 billion, including cash and debt.
content:
The semiconductor company said that it would buy Silicon Labs, a wireless technology company, for $231 a share in cash. - dado ruvic/Reuters
